scripts.browser:sync: browser-sync start --proxy localhost:80 --open "local" --files "public/**/*.php, templates/**/*.php, assets/js/**/*.js, assets/scss/**/*.scss"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run sass:watch" "npm run js:watch" "npm run php:serve" "npm run browser:sync"
scripts.prod: npm run fonts:copy && npm run sass:build && npm run js:build
